amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $25.5 million from AmeriCorp to TRIO educational programs and the geriatric program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the appropriation (by transfer) for Health Resources and Services by $12.5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 242 (Roll no. 647).
